text: Götz George (23 July 1938 - 19 June 2016) was a German actor. He was the son of actor couple Berta Drews and Heinrich George. His was best known for his role of Duisburg detective Horst Schimanski in the TV crime series Tatort. ==References== ==Other websites== * * goetz-george.de Category:1938 births Category:2016 deaths Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:Actors from Berlin
title: Götz George
